description: RISK-011: Project relies on a single developer for DirectX/HLSL and another for DICOM/ETL expertise. The loss or unavailability of either key person would halt progress on critical epics.
mitigation_strategy: Mandate pair programming on all high-complexity tasks. Enforce comprehensive documentation. Cross-train `frontend.dev` in DirectX and `backend.dev` in DICOM basics.
contingency_plan: Pre-vet external contractors with DirectX and DICOM skill sets for emergency backfill.
monitoring_trigger: Project progress stalls when a key developer is on leave for more than 2 days.

description: Senior backend developer is assigned to all specialized, high-complexity tasks (Security, GSPS, Migration), creating a high risk of burnout and becoming a project bottleneck.
mitigation_strategy: Reallocate all non-specialized backend tasks to `backend.dev`. Augment team with an ETL contractor for the migration utility epic.
contingency_plan: If augmentation is not possible, de-scope the migration utility to a professional services offering to protect the core product timeline.
monitoring_trigger: Senior backend developer's utilization exceeds 90% for two consecutive sprints.
